title: 50 assists total?
body: is that 50 assists over several games or 50 in one game? because fig its 50 over several mine arent being recognised.

replies.body: Over several. Calm ya breasts, it takes time to update. You will get it. I got in minutes after I got my 50 (I got them over two games). If you haven't got the gold yet you can't get the assists.
I got the gold then played a game got 11 assists and then played 2 more and got enough for 50/50 but mine haven't updated for like 3 hours
Weird. Mine updated almost instantly. Did you get the assists in ARAM or Normals/Ranked/NotThePirateMap?

I've just come back after a few months off and played 3 ARAM games on the pirate map:
1) Victory - In match history - No pirate credit in over 18 hours
2) Victory - In match history - Credit within 1 minute (yay)
3) Defeat - Nowhere to be found on record - No credit in over 20 minutes

The system seems a little buggy to me.

it's 50 in one game.
good luck fuckers.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kbt0b1Qm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-23T14:01:28.902+0000)

> it's 50 in one game.

=.= They didn't censor that? =O! Also, no it isn't
